application.doc: Update the contents of a configuration file

param.name: path
param.doc: The component path of the configuration file.

param.name: filename
param.doc: The name of the configuration file to update.

method.name: PUT
method.id: Update the contents of a configuration file.
method.doc: To update the contents of an advanced configuration file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP PUT command on the advanced configuration files resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: contents
param.doc: The new contents of the configuration file.

param.name: type
param.doc: Specifies whether this element is a file or directory. Valid value is "file".
